name: Everything Bagel Dip
author: France C
summary: If you're a fan of "everything but the bagel" seasoning, you'll love this low-carb dip made with only 4 ingredients. Bagel seasoning can be found at most major retailers or you can easily make your own using one of the many recipes available online. Serve with bagel chips or your favorite crackers.
ingredients: 1 ½ tablespoons everything bagel seasoning, or to taste
directions: Combine sour cream, cream cheese, and mayonnaise in the bowl of a mini food processor
Blend for 15 to 20 seconds; scrape down the sides of the bowl and add in bagel seasoning
Blend another 10 seconds and taste, adding more seasoning if desired
The flavor will develop the longer it sits
